message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $13,000. This is a fair price for both of us. Let's make this deal happen!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This is the highest I can go while still ensuring a good deal for myself.
Bob, I'm still not quite there yet. Let's split the difference and meet at $13,250. I'm confident this price is fair considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I understand your perspective, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise between our positions.
